flavorText: Born of fire, destined for battle.

foreignData.flavorText: Aus Feuer geboren, zum Kampf bestimmt.
foreignData.name: Pakt mit dem Titanen

Bezahle zu Beginn deines nächsten Versorgungssegments {4}{R}. Falls du dies nicht tust, verlierst du die Partie.

foreignData.flavorText: Proviene del fuego y su destino es la batalla.
foreignData.name: Pacto del titán
foreignData.text:

Al comienzo de tu próximo mantenimiento, paga {4}{R}. Si no lo haces, pierdes el juego.

foreignData.flavorText: Né du feu, destiné à combattre.

Au début de votre prochain entretien, payez {4}{R}. Si vous ne le faites pas, vous perdez la partie.

foreignData.flavorText: Generato dal fuoco, destinato alla battaglia.
foreignData.name: Patto del Titano
foreignData.text:
Crea una pedina creatura Gigante 4/4 rossa.
All'inizio del tuo prossimo mantenimento, paga {4}{R}. Se non lo fai, perdi la partita.

foreignData.text:
赤の４/４の巨人・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
あなたの次のアップキープの開始時に、{4}{R}を支払う。そうしないなら、あなたはこのゲームに敗北する。

foreignData.flavorText: Nascido do fogo, fadado à batalha.
foreignData.name: Pacto do Titã
foreignData.text:
Crie uma ficha de criatura vermelha 4/4 do tipo Gigante.
No início de sua próxima manutenção, pague {4}{R}. Se não fizer isso, você perde o jogo.

foreignData.flavorText: Рожден из огня, предназначен для битвы.
foreignData.name: Договор Титана
foreignData.text:
Создайте одну фишку существа 4/4 красный Гигант.
В начале вашего следующего шага поддержки заплатите {4}{R}. Если вы этого не делаете, вы проигрываете партию.

foreignData.name: 泰坦条约
foreignData.text:
派出一个4/4红色巨人衍生生物。
在你的下一个维持开始时，支付{4}{R}。若你未如此作，则你输掉这盘游戏。

foreignData.name: 泰坦條約
foreignData.text:
派出一個4/4紅色巨人衍生生物。
在你的下一個維持開始時，支付{4}{R}。若你未如此作，則你輸掉這盤遊戲。

name: Pact of the Titan
originalText:
Create a 4/4 red Giant creature token.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {4}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game.

rulings.text: Although originally printed with a characteristic-defining ability that defined its color, this card now has a color indicator. This color indicator can’t be affected by text-changing effects (such as the one created by Crystal Spray), although color-changing effects can still overwrite it.
You have to pay Pact of the Titan’s cost during your next upkeep even if the Giant token doesn’t survive that long. Okay, you don’t have to, but it’s a fairly good idea.
If Pact of the Titan is countered, the delayed triggered ability that threatens you with a game loss won’t trigger at the beginning of your next upkeep.

text:
Create a 4/4 red Giant creature token.
